name: Baller
description:
A perfect time waster!
If you like block breaking and endless games, you'll love Baller. It features a twist on this style of game, plus the addition of special types of blocks.

Simple controls with non-stop, procedurally-generated gameplay.
Destroy as many blocks by launching balls and watching them rebound. Each level requires more balls to destroy each block. Use the special blocks to help you out.

HOW TO PLAY:
Touch and hold to aim, release to fire

Game Features:
*Endless gameplay
*No two games are the same
*Free to play
*Simple controls
